name: Colorful Reflective Frame - Uniqueness and Plurality
description: Collab between Gustavo Manute & Rodrigo Cid, which makes reference to the history of art, through the refletion of colors, in the rotating frame. It talks about uniqueness and reproducibility. The world of NFTs is revolutionizing our form of perception of unicity and plurality. The work tells us that the uniqueness of the work no longer needs to exist, but only the uniqueness of property, and that the digital artwork, unlike any other material object, can be in more than one place simultaneously. The ownership of works is beyond works, and the existence of an entity if beyond location..
